short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to review other Twitter users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A extension which allows you to review other users. Anyone who has the extension will be able to see what you commented.
